page.description: Copies the values in the current Repeating Section row to a new row.

argument.name: repeatingSectionID
argument.description: Row in repeating section to copy.

section.description: The first non-dirty Repeating Section row is used as the target row. If there are no non-dirty Repeating Section rows, a new row is added to the Repeating Section.

ref.link: Duplicate and Copy Rows in a Repeating Section

see.ref: Duplicate and Copy Rows in a Repeating Section
